Mike Pence , who introduced a similar bill late in the last Congress, said that it is the government's job, not the Fed's, to boost economic growth and drive up employment. It is the job of Congress and the President to put forth pro-growth policies on taxes, to rein in government spending and to reduce the regulatory burden in order to create an environment that is friendly to our nation's job creators, he said in a statement.
